channel.title: Can't connect to any server?
channel.description:
Should be an easy fix, right? Well I believe I've tried everything :(. I can't log in to my server but I have already tried going into the client.java folder and switched the client IP to local (both 127.0.0.1 & 0.0.0.0), neither have worked, and I tried putting my host name (infernopkz.no-ip.org) in the file and it also didnt work... Can someone please help me? I've been trying to fix this for 2 days and I've tried everything I googled but nothing will work. I've even tried downloading different server/clients and get the same exact thing. I've posted 2 threads on the forum and nobody will reply. Someone please help! :confused:
EDIT: Btw, I'm almost positive I set the caches in the right spot. I even went to the signlink.java and I have the cache where the directory leads to. I'm running on the InsidiaX v2 source/client if that helps too.

item.title: Can't connect to any server?
item.dc:creator: @xXThatOneSkaterKidXx xXThatOneSkaterKidXx
item.description:
@xXThatOneSkaterKidXx wrote:

[quote=“Crucid, post:2, topic:469284”]so you have set all the ip’s to 127.0.0.1 and you add the cache to the right directory?

erm. link me to the source you downloaded and i guess i’ll fix it for you.[/quote]

Client/Source: http://www.mediafire.com/?we5cj66cdla405l

Cache: http://www.mediafire.com/?j99t7b7ijlaulnq

Thanks bro I’ve been trying to fix this for what seems like forever.

Read full topic
